sourcesContent:
/* Challenge: Build the Card component For now, hard-code in the data (like the rating, title, price, etc.) Notes: - Only render 1 instance (I already did this for you) - The star icon and photo (katie-zaferes.png) are in the images folder for your use - Make sure to include: - image - star icon (star.png), rating, and review count - title - cost/person - The main purpose of this challenge is to show you where our limitations currently are, so don't worry about the fact that you're hard-coding all this data into the component. */ import person1 from "../images/person1.png"; import person2 from "../images/person2.png"; import bike from "../images/bike.png"; function Card() { return (
  • 5.0 (6)•USA Life lessons with Katie Zaferes From $136 / person
  • ONLINE 5.0(30)•USA Learn wedding photography From $125 / person
  • 4.8(2)•USA Group Mountain Biking From $50 / person
); } export default Card;
